greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to write n as a product of a number that is not a perfect power and a squarefree number.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n)={sumdiv(n, d, d<>1 && !ispower(d) && issquarefree(n/d))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 26 2018
xref: Positions of zeros are A246549. Range appears to be A075427.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, May 10 2018
